data.name: 謎塔魔女 Demo
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 800 equivalent or greater
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 equivalent or greater

content_descriptors.notes:
THIS GAME DEPICTS SEXUAL ACTS BETWEEN THE PLAYER AND FEMALE CHARACTERS, THEREFORE THOSE SEXUAL CONTENTS AND GENERAL MATURE CONTENTS ARE NOT

APPROPRIATE FOR VIEWING AT WORK. ALL CHARACTERS INVOLVE IN SEXUAL CONTENTS ARE OVER THE AGE OF 18.
